addrLine.ref: Tibetan subject librarian at the Bodleian Library

availability.licence: This summary description is released under a CC0 licence.

msDesc.head: The first volume of the Hundred Thousand Verse on the Perfection of Wisdom

msContents.summary: NOTE: This record has yet to be fully checked.

msItem.title: ཤེས་རབ་ཀྱི་ཕ་རོལ་ཏུ་ཕྱིན་པ་སྟོང་ཕྲག་བརྒྱ་པ
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa[śatasāhasrikāprajñāpāramitā]
msItem.note: There is a verse below the regular text, outside the margin, on the verso of the first folio. It reads: kyai / yul gyi mchog gyur lan pa mthong smon mchog / / gsung rabs khyad 'phags rgyas pa 'bum gyi mchog / / yon gyi bdag po dpal ldan 'phel gyi mchog / / maN g+ha laM / There is also a single page colophon with nine lines describing the production to the text. The orthography is very poor and the silver ink is not very legible.
msItem.incipit: rgya gar skad du /_sha ta sA ha sri ka pradz+&A pa ra mi ta/_bod skad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_glegs bam thog ma/_bam po dang po/_'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi ri bya rgod 'phungs pa la/
msItem.explicit: bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar/_'du shes mi rtag pa nyid/_'du shes mi rtag pa nyid kyis stong ste/_'du shes mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yang /_'du shes mi rtag pa nyid ma lags/_'dus shes mi rtag pa nyid las gud na yang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/_'du shes mi rtag nyid kyang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes mi rtag pa nyid do //_bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_'du shes mi rtag zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o//
msItem.colophon: oM sva sti si d+d+haM/_'phrin las dpag med rab tan sa chen steng //_yon tan chu bo sting mtha' yas pa'i dbus//_... bla ma'i gdan sa sgo mo bsam gling nas//_skyes mchog chos .. dkar rgyud mchog//_'gren pa da ltar bzhugs kyi rin po che//_chos rje'i mchog gyur byang chub seng ge pa//_bsrang sngags rdo rje'i rigs 'dzin shags seng pa //_yabs sras mkhan slob zhabs la gus 'phyag 'tshal/ /_... yang rab bstan pa'i bdag po rgyal ba'i sras//_'dus pa rgya mtsho dge 'dun tshogs kyis skor//_yang dag gnas lugs rtogs pa'i rin po che/ /_blo gros dbang phyug bkra shis rgyal mtshan dpal //_chos rje rin po che la gus phyag 'tshal//_kya'i//_pho rong gnyis pa rgyal chen rtse mo nas//_gong mas dbang skur lung dang lags tags 'dzin//_mi dbang chen po lhar rgyal don grub pa / /_khu dbon yab sras sku tshe stan gyur cig//_bde skyid 'dzom pa smon la lhas sdings nas//_stan la gus zhing stong la rab tu rgyas//_shA kya'i tshul 'dzin shAkya las 'tsho ba//_byams dang snying rjes 'khor 'bangs bde la bkod//_spa ba'i sgra 'dul byams pa'i mi bde kyis// drung chen rgyal ba sku tshe stan gyur cig//_kye phun lha bzang jo bo ban can zhol//_mda' na chab chen dal gyis bab pa'i 'gram//_'bur du dod pa mthong smong bkra shis 'dir//_yab mes rigs bzangs gser g.yu rtsegs pa 'dra//_gdung rus khyad 'phags phe chen sgyer pa'i rgyud//_tshul khrims dad ldan dge shes nam rin pa //_... ding sand mkhas pa dpal mgon bdag gis bris//_khyus rig mu tig ltar la rgyus pa 'di//_'phan yul mkhas sdus rnams kyis bzab//_cha ga glegs shing gser rtsi rgyan pa 'di //_ding sang mkhas pa bsod nams mgon po s ..//_rin chen gser dngul 'od zer 'phro ba 'di//_grogs mched gnyis kyis legs pas bzabs//_zhus dag mkhas pas nor ba'i skyon rnams bsal//_... //

layout.p: The paper is black in colour

handDesc.handNote: The text is written in gold and silver ink

decoDesc.decoNote: The title page / first folio is on a board much shorter (42.5 cm) than the text. It is perhaps sawn down to this size. There is also a drawing of jewel at bottom right corner. The recto of the second folio has a silk cover.

history.acquisition: S.C. 33628, 33722. 25 Sept. 1905, donation by the Government of India. (Donated with mss. a.12, a.13 & a.15).
